Uses of Interface
a12345678.change.to.your.matriculation.number.MagicEffectRealization

  • Uses of MagicEffectRealization in a12345678.change.to.your.matriculation.number

    Classes in a12345678.change.to.your.matriculation.number that implement MagicEffectRealization
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Concoction
    Concoctions can affect health and mana of the target at the same time and additionally cast any number of spells
    class 
    HealthPotion
    HealthPotions increase the consumer's mana
    class 
    MagicItem
    MagicItems are items that can cause magic effects on other objects.
    class 
    ManaPotion
    A ManaPotion provides mana to its consumer
    class 
    Potion
    A potion has a specific magic effect on its consumer
    class 
    Scroll
    A Scroll object contains a spell that can be read by someone.
    class 
    Wizard
    Wizard class objects are the primary actors in the game.
    Methods in a12345678.change.to.your.matriculation.number with parameters of type MagicEffectRealization
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Spell.cast (MagicSource source, MagicEffectRealization target)
    Ensure necessary magic level and get necessary energy by calling provideMana on source (this will typically reduce MP in source).
    boolean
    Wizard.castRandomSpell (MagicEffectRealization target)
    If this object's knownSpells is empty, return false otherwise choose a random spell from knownSpells and delegate to castSpell(Spell, MagicEffectRealization)
    boolean
    Wizard.castSpell (Spell s, MagicEffectRealization target)
    If s or target is null, IllegalArgumentException has to be thrown; if wizard is dead (isDead) no action can be taken and false is returned; if wizard does not know the spell, false is returned; call cast on s with this as source and parameter target as target return true, if cast was called;
    void
    AttackingSpell.doEffect (MagicEffectRealization target)
    If the target is protected against this spell (isProtected), then protection against exactly this spell is removed (removeProtection).
    void
    HealingSpell.doEffect (MagicEffectRealization target)
    Use one of the functions heal, healPercent, enforceMagic or enforceMagicPercent according to the flags type and percentage
    void
    ProtectingSpell.doEffect (MagicEffectRealization target)
    Call setProtection method on target with attacks as parameter
    abstract void
    Spell.doEffect (MagicEffectRealization target)
    The actual effect of the spell on target must be implemented by the subclasses
    boolean
    Wizard.useItem (Tradeable item, MagicEffectRealization target)
    If item or target is null, IllegalArgumentException has to be thrown; if wizard is dead (isDead) no action can be taken and false is returned; if wizard does not possess the item, false is returned; call useOn on the item with parameter target as target; return true, if useOn was called.
    void
    Concoction.useOn (MagicEffectRealization target)
    If usages is greater than 0 reduce usages by 1 (tryUsage method) and change HP of target by health (call method heal(health) or takeDamage(health) depending on sign of health) and change MP of target by mana (call method enforceMagic(magic) or weakenMagic(magic) depending on sign of mana) and call cast Method for every spell in spells.
    void
    HealthPotion.useOn (MagicEffectRealization target)
    If usages is greater than 0 reduce usages by 1 (tryUsage method) and increase HP of target by health (call method heal(health))
    void
    ManaPotion.useOn (MagicEffectRealization target)
    If usages greater than 0 reduce usages by 1 (tryUsage method) and increase MP of target by mana (call method enforceMagic(mana))
    void
    Scroll.useOn (MagicEffectRealization target)
    If usages is greater than 0 reduce usages by 1 (tryUsage method) and cast the spell using this as magic source and parameter target as target
    void
    Tradeable.useOn (MagicEffectRealization target)
    If target is null, an IllegalArgumentException must be thrown; use the object on the target
    boolean
    Wizard.useRandomItem (MagicEffectRealization target)
    If this object's inventory is empty, return false; otherwise choose a random item from inventory and delegate to useItem(Tradeable, MagicEffectRealization).
